actions.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected items? This action cannot be undone.

yamlEditor.duplicateKey: Duplicate key '{key}' found. Later values will override earlier ones. Please remove duplicates.

dropzone.dragOrClick: Drag files here or click to select
dropzone.dragOrClickReplace: Drag or click to replace files

confirm.title: Confirm Action
confirm.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.bulkDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected items? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.unlinkMessage: Are you sure you want to unlink? This will only remove the association, the data itself will not be deleted.
confirm.bulkUnlinkMessage: Are you sure you want to unlink {count} selected items? The data itself will not be deleted.
confirm.stopMessage: Are you sure you want to stop this task?
confirm.deleteVulnMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete vulnerability "{name}" and its related data.
confirm.bulkDeleteVulnMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the following {count} vulnerabilities and their related data.
confirm.deleteScanMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete scan record "{name}" and its related data.
confirm.bulkDeleteScanMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the following {count} scan records and their related data.
confirm.stopScanMessage: Are you sure you want to stop scan task "{name}"? The scan will be aborted, but collected data will be preserved.
confirm.deleteOrgMessage: This will permanently delete organization "{name}" and unlink its domains. The domains themselves will not be deleted.
confirm.bulkDeleteOrgMessage: This will permanently delete the following {count} organizations and unlink their domains. The domains themselves will not be deleted.
confirm.deleteToolMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete opensource tool "{name}" and its configuration.
confirm.deleteCustomToolMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete custom tool "{name}" and its configuration.
confirm.deleteTargetMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete target "{name}" and all its associated data.
confirm.bulkDeleteTargetMessage: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the following {count} targets and all their associated data.
confirm.unlinkTargetMessage: Are you sure you want to unlink target "{name}" from this organization? This will only remove the association, the target itself will not be deleted.
confirm.bulkUnlinkTargetMessage: This will unlink the following {count} targets from this organization. The targets themselves will not be deleted.
confirm.deleteScheduledScanMessage: Are you sure you want to delete scheduled scan task "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.deleteEngineMessage: Are you sure you want to delete engine "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.deleteNucleiRepoMessage: Are you sure you want to delete repository "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.deleteWordlistMessage: Are you sure you want to delete wordlist "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

fingerprints.title: Fingerprints
fingerprints.name: Fingerprint Name
fingerprints.helpText:
• EHole: Red team asset identification tool, supports keyword, favicon hash and other identification methods
• Goby: Attack surface mapping tool, contains a large number of web applications and device fingerprints
• Wappalyzer: Browser extension that can identify the technology stack used by websites
• Fingers: HTTP fingerprint library with detailed rule matching
• FingerPrintHub: Nuclei-style fingerprint templates with HTTP matchers
• ARL: Asset Reconnaissance Lighthouse fingerprint rules in YAML format

dialogs.exportDesc: Export all {count} fingerprints as JSON file.
dialogs.deleteSelectedDesc: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected fingerprints? This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.deleteAllDesc: Are you sure you want to delete all {count} fingerprints? This action cannot be undone.

fingers.addDesc: Add a new HTTP fingerprint rule

fingerprinthub.addDesc: Add a new Nuclei-style fingerprint template

arl.addDesc: Add a new ARL fingerprint rule

form.detectionRulesHint: Use objects for JSON format, comma-separated for arrays
form.name: Name
form.author: Author
form.httpPlaceholder: JSON array of HTTP matching rules
form.arlRuleHint: Supports body, header, title matchers. Use || and && to combine conditions

import.eholeInvalidMissing: Invalid EHole format: missing fingerprint field
import.eholeInvalidArray: Invalid EHole format: fingerprint must be an array
import.eholeInvalidFields: Invalid EHole format: fingerprint missing required fields (cms, keyword)
import.gobyInvalidFields: Invalid Goby format: fingerprint missing required fields (product, rule)
import.gobyInvalidFormat: Invalid Goby format: must be array or object
import.wappalyzerInvalidApps: Invalid Wappalyzer format: apps/technologies must be an object
import.fingersInvalidFormat: Invalid Fingers format: must be an array
import.fingersInvalidArray: Invalid Fingers format: must be an array
import.fingersInvalidFields: Invalid Fingers format: fingerprint missing required fields (name, rule)
import.fingerprinthubInvalidFormat: Invalid FingerPrintHub format: must be an array
import.fingerprinthubInvalidArray: Invalid FingerPrintHub format: must be an array
import.fingerprinthubInvalidFields: Invalid FingerPrintHub format: fingerprint missing required fields
import.arlFormatHint: YAML format with name and rule fields
import.arlInvalidArray: Invalid ARL format: must be an array
import.arlInvalidFields: Invalid ARL format: fingerprint missing required fields (name, rule)

workers.title: Workers
workers.name: Worker Name
workers.addWorkerDesc: Enter SSH connection info for remote VPS. After adding, you can deploy scanning environment via "Manage Deployment"
workers.noWorkersDesc: Add remote VPS servers as scan workers to enable distributed scanning
workers.confirmDeleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete worker "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
workers.confirmUninstallDesc: Are you sure you want to uninstall Agent and delete related containers on the remote host? This will not uninstall Docker.
workers.workerNodesDesc: Manage distributed scan workers, support remote deployment and monitoring

helpDialog.title: What is Distributed Scanning?
helpDialog.desc: Distributed scanning allows you to distribute scan tasks to multiple remote servers (scan workers) for parallel execution, significantly improving scanning efficiency.

banner.title: Distributed Scanning:
banner.desc: Add VPS Workers → One-click Deploy → Auto Task Distribution

steps.step1Desc: Click "Add Worker" button, fill in VPS SSH connection info (IP, port, username, password)
steps.step2Desc: Click "Manage Deployment" button, system will automatically install Docker and heartbeat agent via SSH
steps.step3Desc: After deployment, workers will report heartbeat automatically, scan tasks will be distributed based on load

form.ipInvalid: Please enter a valid IP address
form.passwordHint: Password is only used for deployment and will not be stored in plain text
form.passwordEditHint: Enter new password if you want to change it

terminal.pendingHint: Node not deployed, click the button on the right to start deploying scan environment

metadata.title: Xingrin - Attack Surface Management Platform | ASM
metadata.description: Xingrin - Attack Surface Management (ASM) platform, providing automated asset discovery, vulnerability scanning, subdomain enumeration, port scanning, and more. Supports distributed scanning, Nuclei integration, and scheduled tasks.
metadata.keywords: ASM, Attack Surface Management, Vulnerability Scanning, Asset Discovery, Bug Bounty, Penetration Testing, Nuclei, Subdomain Enumeration, Security Tools, EASM, Security
metadata.ogDescription: Attack Surface Management (ASM) platform providing automated asset discovery and vulnerability scanning

www.example.com
mail.example.com
